term: What goes down when they get there?
content:
when they arrive, but they were not really accepted
they were greeted by 3 men sent by Talleyrand, the foreign minister, who were so low rank that we donâ€™t know their names and are called agents x, y, and z HENCE the name XYZ affair
they say that if they wanted to see Talleyrand, they would have to pay a $250000 bribe
	no way to treat other nations! so mean
Do the delegates pay up? hell naw bro, and when the news of this gets back to NA, the american public is outraged
